abstract.para: This project will be responsible for the full Turkish support of the Uludag distribution. Project will carry out software development related to UTF-8 compatibility on one hand, while doing localization and translation on the other hand.

sect1.para:
Within the scope of Uludag Turkish Project:
The upstream will be contacted in order to make the necessary changes in the source code for UTF-8 compatibility, in case the upstream does not comply compatibility will be provided via patches, The lexicon to be used for translation will be chosen or built, the guidelines for translators will be compiled and a translation manual will be prepared, All the user visible components of the packages (package descriptions, messages, help pages, HOW-TO documents, manuals, etc.) will be translated, All the documents for users and developers will be determined and classified, The acceptance test for the contributed translations and documents will be carried out, the relevant process will be defined and a manual will be prepared,
Project contact: Ayşe Genç, ayse@uludag.org.tr
